jd: From: Rajeev, Mobcoder rajeev.g@mobcoderstaffing.com Reply to: rajeev.g@mobcoderstaffing.com Senior Agile Delivery Lead RemoteJob Descripion-We are looking for an experienced Senior Agile Delivery Lead to provide software product delivery servant leadership for teams creating our robust suite of cloud-native enterprise applications in the rapidly growing healthcare software industry. If you have a passion for applying Lean-Agile principles to drive operational excellence and continuous improvement, this position is a great fit.Job Summary: As a Senior Agile Delivery Lead, you will apply Lean-Agile principles to help drive teams with a focus on operational excellence and continuous improvement. You will serve as a mentor and coach on Lean-Agile theory, principles, and best practices, and you will be responsible for facilitating ceremonies, removing obstacles, and fostering a culture of collaboration and teamwork.Your Responsibilities:• Serve as the Agile Delivery Lead for one or more teams.• Facilitate ceremonies (e.g., daily standups, backlog grooming, sprint planning, sprint demos/retrospectives).• Collect and present metrics in various formats for different audiences.• Identify, develop, and use data to create actionable plans for optimization and improvements.• Serve as a mentor and coach on Lean-Agile theory, principles, and best practices.
